section.p: The context menu for an element can be called up by right clicking on this element or selecting it and pressing the context menu key on your keyboard. The context menu key can usually be found between the right Alt and Ctrl or right Win and Ctrl keys. Commands available from the context menu are completely identical to the corresponding commands of the main menu and toolbar.

ul.li: Collapse all _fixme_ [ui] : collapse all branches in the archive;
Clear archive: clear all records from the archive;
Export: export contents of the archive.

p.note: Clearing the archive permanently deletes all records. This is a destructive operation that can not be undone, nor the records be recovered.

ul.li: Restore: restore the student profile from the archive to the specified subdivision;
Remove: remove profile from the archive and delete all profile data.
Edit profile _fixme_ [ui] : edit student profile;
Archive _fixme_ [ui] : prompts for confirmation to move the profile onto the archive;
Export: export student profile from the database.
Add student: open student profile in addition mode (see _fixme_ [xref]);
Edit subdivision _fixme_ [ui] : open Subdivision settings in editing mode (see _fixme_ [xref]);
Remove subdivision: removes subdivision with confirmation prompt and moves all students associated with it to the archive;
Collapse: collapse subdivision branch in tree view;
Expand all: expand subdivision branch in tree view;
Export: export subdivision data together with all associated students (see _fixme_ [xref]).
Edit school profile _fixme_ [ui];
Add subdivision: add a subdivision to the school structure;
Collapse: collapse tree view;
Expand all: expand all tree branches;
Export structure _fixme_ [ui] : export school data and subdivision structure (see _fixme_ [xref]);
Export all: export all school data with subdivisions and all active students (see _fixme_ [xref]);
Export all students: export all active students (excluding archive) (see _fixme_ [xref]).
